item.title: Understanding Hugo Shortcodes
item.author: jorgitobaliero@gmail.com (Jorge Electricidad)
item.description: Hugo shortcodes are powerful tools for adding custom HTML or other special content within Markdown files without complex code. They enable enhanced flexibility and are a core part of Hugo’s functionality, offering reusable snippets for embedding media, custom components, or dynamic content. Below, weâ€™ll explore what shortcodes are and highlight some popular examples.

item.title: Lightbi Custom Shortcodes
item.author: jorgitobaliero@gmail.com (Jorge Electricidad)
item.description: To create your own shortcodes in Hugo, add an HTML file in layouts/shortcodes/. This theme provides the following useful custom shortcodes:
